input_text:
Job Title: Remote Entry Level Life-Health Insurance Agent

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Finance, Sales

Description:
Miller Family Agency strives to provide our sales force with the most innovative marketing and lead programs, while offering the highest quality insurance products and services to our clients. To schedule an interview, go to: https://millerfamilyagency.gr8.com/
Job Summary:
This will be a work from home position that will call warm leads, set appointments, and virtually meet with the clients for approximately 45 minutes and also help them pick out the best plan to meet their needs and budget. We follow a duplicatable system that puts you in front of qualified buyers. We have a streamlined lead generation system. No Cold calling. The right fit for this position is someone who is confident, coachable and not afraid to work hard. We will train the right person. Must be authorized to work in the US, no work visas offered at this time.
If you are interested in speaking with one of our hiring managers, apply now and we can work on finding a time to connect with you soon.
What weâ€™re looking for:
Looking for a business partner who is committed to helping families achieve their goals.Must have a Life Insurance Producer License (or willing to get license)Present and sell insurance policies to clientsDevelop and calculate suitable plans based on clients' needsPersonal Development is a MUST - We are looking for someone who spends a minimum of 30 minutes/day on personal development so that you have what it takes to develop others!Comply with insurance standards and regulations
Benefits:*Health, Dental, Vision, Life, Retirement*Flexible Schedule - Full time or part time*No cold calling - Work only with clients that have requested information*Warm lead generating system*Training and mentorship by our most experienced/qualified agents*Coaching that can help you grow your business*The ability to be your own boss and run a business*The opportunity to build a legacy that can be carried over to your family or sold to a future entrepreneur** Know that what you do impacts families in a positive way**
Schedule an interview today using this link: https://millerfamilyagency.gr8.com/

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Remote Entry Level Life-Health Insurance Agent
output_json.summary: Work from home position focusing on calling warm leads, setting appointments, and virtually meeting with clients to assist in selecting insurance plans.
job_responsibilities: Comply with insurance standards and regulations
benefits: Ability to be your own boss
output_json.company_information: Miller Family Agency provides innovative marketing and lead programs, high-quality insurance products, and services.

other.content: *Health, Dental, Vision, Life, Retirement*Flexible Schedule - Full time or part time*No cold calling - Work only with clients that have requested information*Warm lead generating system*Training and mentorship by our most experienced/qualified agents*Coaching that can help you grow your business*The ability to be your own boss and run a business*The opportunity to build a legacy that can be carried over to your family or sold to a future entrepreneur** Know that what you do impacts families in a positive way**
